attributes.action: Introduce a Pet Licensing scheme with FREE neutering, like the Calgary Method.
attributes.additional_details:
We advocate a UK Dog Licensing System 

Owners licence pets 
Fees aid spaying/neutering 
Enforce licences 
Free neutering 
Financial aid to rescue centres 
UK funds 55% via revenue & 45% from taxes
In 2022: 125k licences, 75% drop in aggressive incidents

We urge the Government to adopt this scheme for pet welfare, responsibility, and community safety, drawing from Calgary's success.

Reference: 
https://www.aspcapro.org/sites/default/files/city-of-calgary-idprogram-profile-by-aspcapro_0.pdf
attributes.background:
We urge the Government & Parliament to introduce a mandatory dog licensing scheme inspired by Calgary, Canada. This action is essential due to several pressing issues inc, rescue dogs and the XL Bully attacks in the UK's pet ownership landscape.
Active public involvement can aid a brighter future.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bring back a Dog Licence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650

Support small and large animal rescues with grants for veterinary bills:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644924
